verses.verse: I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G2136>Euodia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G846>Syntyche,<s%> <S%G5426>to<s%> think the same way <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2532>Yes,<s%> I <S%G2065>beg<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G4805>yokefellow,<s%> <S%G4815>help<s%> these <S%G846>women,<s%> for <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G4866>labored<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2815>Clement<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> fellow <S%G4904>workers,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G3063>Finally,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G4586>honorable,<s%> whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G1342>just,<s%> whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G53>pure,<s%> whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G4375>lovely,<s%> whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are of good <S%G2163>report;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G703>virtue,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1868>praise,<s%> think <S%G3049>about<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

The <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3129>you<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3129>learned,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3880>received,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me:<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> these <S%G2532>things,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3171>greatly,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>length<s%> you have <S%G330>revived<s%> your <S%G5426>thought<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1700>me;<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you did <S%G5426>indeed<s%> <S%G2532>take<s%> <S%G5426>thought,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> you lacked <S%G170>opportunity.<s%>

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G1473>in<s%> respect to <S%G5304>lack,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> state I <S%G1510>am,<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> content in <S%G842>it.<s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1492>how<s%> to be <S%G5013>humbled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I know also <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G1722>abound.<s%> In <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> I have <S%G3453>learned<s%> the secret <S%G2532>both<s%> to be <S%G5526>filled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be in <S%G5302>need.<s%>

<S%G5210>You<s%> yourselves <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1492>know,<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G5374>Philippians,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the Good <S%G2098>News,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1577>assembly<s%> shared <S%G2841>with<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3056>matter<s%> of <S%G1394>giving<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>receiving<s%> <S%G3361>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3441>only.<s%>

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1934>seek<s%> for the <S%G1390>gift,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G1934>seek<s%> for the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> that <S%G4121>increases<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3056>account.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G568>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2532>things,<s%> and <S%G4052>abound.<s%> I am <S%G4137>filled,<s%> having <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G1891>Epaphroditus<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that came <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> a <S%G2175>sweet-smelling<s%> <S%G3744>fragrance,<s%> an <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> and <S%G2101>well-pleasing<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
